notes_text: Possession of small amounts is punishable by fine or imprisonment of up to 3 years. Sale and transportation punishable by imprisonment of 3–12 years. Cultivation punishable by imprisonment from 6 months to 5 years. Higher penalties for organized crime.
notes: Possession of small amounts is punishable by fine or imprisonment of up to 3 years. Sale and transportation punishable by imprisonment of 3–12 years. Cultivation punishable by imprisonment from 6 months to 5 years. Higher penalties for organized crime.
notes_raw: {{main|Cannabis in Serbia}} Possession of small amounts is punishable by fine or imprisonment of up to 3 years. Sale and transportation punishable by imprisonment of 3–12 years. Cultivation punishable by imprisonment from 6 months to 5 years. Higher penalties for [[organized crime]].<ref>{{citation |url = http://www.paragraf.rs/propisi/krivicni_zakonik.html |title = Krivični zakonik (''The Criminal Code'') |via = [[Paragraf Lex]] |date = 2013 |access-date = 17 February 2011 |archive-date = 5 September 2019 |archive-url = https://web.archive.org/web/20190905020735/https://www.paragraf.rs/propisi/krivicni_zakonik.html |url-status = live }}</ref>
